title: Caregiver leave policies protect employment during crises
description: Caregiver leave policies protect employment during crises
content:
Scenario: Caregiver leave policies protect employment during crises
    Given caregiving crises occur unpredictably
    And James may need to take sudden leave for David's care
    When the workplace_elohim advocates for leave policies
    Then caregiver leave should be available like parental leave
    And leave should be protected employment, not termination risk
    And James should access leave without penalty
    And workplace should recognize adult care like child care
    And caregiver leave should be employment protection
